search.list: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('加入书架')!=-1){var myArray=new Array();myArray.push(html);return myArray;};return jsoups(html,'div.mySearch > div+ul');}
search.title: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('加入书架')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'h1.bookTitle');};return jsoup(text,'li:nth-child(1) > a');}
search.url: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('加入书架')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'head > link:nth-child(3)@attr->href');};return jsoup(text,'li:nth-child(1) > a@attr->href');}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.novel_info_main > div > i > a');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.novel_info_main > div > div > em');}
